comment.author: 22648179@N00
comment._content: William M. (Marmaduke) Kavanaugh, represented Arkansas in the US Senate in 1913. This exact photo and a bio are at bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=K000023

comment.author: 64873670@N05
comment._content: I have a marble (coffee table) from the B.B. Sterling Annex 1908 and has W.M. Kavanaugh as school board president any info on the school would be greatly appreciated email at bamage4u@yahoo.com
